title: UserKernel...
body: Hey-I'm kinda dumb when it comes to computers. Could someone just help me get LoL running on my Mac? Ty

replies.body: Kernel errors arei normally caused by security settings that is blocking your game files from being read, maybe by an antivirus.  The way to go about it may be a bit different on your Mac depending on more specifics on the error you received.  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for your specific issue so our tech team can find out more and get it fixed up!
Ty, but I just spam downloaded LoL until I didn't get a corrupted file, xD. Everything's fine now.
